statements: DELETE FROM digital_assets WHERE blockchain_transaction_id IN (SELECT transaction_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY);
DELETE FROM digital_assets WHERE id = (SELECT id FROM digital_assets WHERE asset_name = 'Sample Asset' LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 WEEK;
DELETE FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE block_id IN (SELECT block_id FROM asset_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000);
DELETE FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Ethereum' AND blockchain_transaction_id = 'b5e7fc3a-4df1-4bb0-b17e-d53904c4e703';
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE sender_address = '0x123456789' OR receiver_address = '0xabcdef123';
DELETE FROM asset_metadata WHERE metadata_key = 'description' AND metadata_value = 'Detailed information about the asset';
